data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 120,471 believers in Huila and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Huila, Colombia

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Huila, Colombia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 929,976 cultural Christians in the state of Huila to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Huila. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 120,471 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Huila.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Huila who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Huila, Colombia to the gospel today.

location.name: Huila
location.cities_list: Neiva, Pitalito, Garzón, Campoalegre, La Plata
location.cities_list_w_pop: Neiva (352,855), Pitalito (53,685), Garzón (29,451), Campoalegre (22,568), La Plata (19,275)
